raw:
German mathematician
Adolf Schepp (1837 – 9 March 1905)[1] was a German mathematician who translated several mathematical works from English and Italian into German.[1][2]

References[edit]


^ a b "Lieutenant Adolf Schepp", Notes, Bulletin of the American Mathematical Society, 11: 563, 1905, doi:10.1090/S0002-9904-1905-01269-6, ISSN 0002-9904.

^ Cajori, Florian (1999), A History of Mathematics, New York: Chelsea, p. 458, ISBN 978-0-8284-0203-3.
